post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
This must be of CIBC...
------------------------ We are presently seeking a Application Consultant - DT a permanent position for a major financial institution located in Toronto, ON.
Your name came up in a search and we wanted to know if you are presently available and interested in a permanent opportunity.
Here is a link to the position on our website http://www.symbioticgroup.com/fr_viewjobs.htm , it is titled Advisory Application Developer.
If you are interested please reply via email with your current CV and a convenient time that we can speak.
Kind regards,
Agnes N. Maison - Symbiotic Group Inc. 2020 Winston Park Drive, Suite 100 Oakville ON L6H 6X7 Phone: 905-287-5595 Fax: 905-287-5599 Mobile: 416-820-8873 email: agnes.maison@symbioticgroup.com Web: www.symbioticgroup.com Jobs: http://www.symbioticgroup.com/fr_viewjobs.htm Office Location: http://maps.google.ca/maps?ie=UTF8&q=2020+winston+park+drive,+oakville+ontario+canada&ll=43.508099,-79.668067&spn=0.014971,0.038452&z=15 Linkedin: http://www.linkedin.com/in/agnesnmaison
Position: Application Consultant - DT Mandatory Skills: See below Location: GTA Rate/Salary: Negotiable Start Date: ASAP
Job Category: Information Technology Job Type: Full Time Location: Toronto, Ontario, Canada No.Openings: 3 Travel%: 0
· Description:
Application Consultant - DT
Business Unit Description: Technology: responsible for the delivery of technology in support of all the Bank businesses and customers. Directly aligns to the Bank's businesses, with a technology team for each business. Delivers world class solutions in support of business strategies, through a combination of in-house systems development and working with leading technology partners. This group also manages The Bank's core computing facilities, telecommunications and networks globally.
Retail Markets Technology: plans, delivers and supports end-to-end technology solutions for the various distribution channels and full range of products that service all of The Bank's Retail clients: The Bank's retail branch network, Internet, Automated Banking Machines (ABM's), telephone banking, credit products, GICs, Deposit Accounts, Global Payments and Wealth Management/Investment Products.
Relevant Job Criteria: . There are three (3) regular full time positions available.
Job Overview: PURPOSE OF JOB: As an integral part of Strategy team, you will provide strategic direction in the technical evolution of our application portfolio in 3-5 year outlook.
You have 5-10 years of experience in end-to-end design and implementation of software solutions on large-scale projects. You are big picture visionary as well as, hands-on implementation guru. You enjoy keeping on top of technology trends, standards and processes.
MAJOR ACTIVITIES: . Forms and evolves strategic direction in the technical evolution of application portfolio . Performs research and POC evaluations into technology, product and tooling viability . Elaborates and maintains Roadmaps for application portfolio . Communicates strategic direction to application stakeholders . Ensures application design and development artifacts comply with strategic direction
Requirements: KNOWLEDGE/SKILL REQUIREMENTS: . Demonstrates initiative, drive and innovation . Very good conceptual and implementation skills and ability to bridge both . Very good analytical and research skills . Experience designing and implementing solutions for large-scale projects . Familiarity with all phases of SDLC and exposure to formal SDLC frameworks (RUP, XP) . In-depth understanding of software design, UML, design patterns and best practices . In-depth understanding of solutions architecture . Extensive and recent hands-on implementation experience including Java or C++/C# . Experience in Service Oriented Architecture, including REST . Desktop application development experience (Swing, Winforms/WPF etc.) . Web application development experience, exposure to RIA (Flex, Silverlight and HTML5) . Very good verbal and written communication skills . Team player
MUST HAVES: . Enterprise level application development (6 years) . Development team lead (4 years) . Team building experience (3 years)
NICE TO HAVE: . Exposure to enterprise information systems (EIS) integration . Java/J2EE experience (WLS, WAS) . Spring experience . OSGi, PRISM, CAB or other modular frameworks experience . .NET experience
CONTACTS: . Peers and middle to senior management
PHYSICAL DEMANDS/WORKING CONDITIONS: . Normal office environment.
ATTRIBUTES: . Analytic/Systematic Thinking . Results Orientation . Communication . Accountability . Teamwork & Partnering . Building Trust
Location of Position(s) : Toronto
Technology & Operations
Skills: Accountability Analytic/Systematic Thinking Building Trust Communication Consulting Influencing & Negotiating Problem Solving & Decision Making Process Engineering/Process Design Results Orientation Service Orientation Teamwork & Partnering
About Symbiotic Group Inc.
Symbiotic Group is a Human Resource Solutions company specializing in IT recruitment and Aboriginal Recruitment (IT & Non-IT positions).
Our focus is on building a customized recruitment approach that enables us to clearly understand the needs of our clients, search our detailed database quickly and accurately and customize a recruitment approach that enhances our client's processes - saving clients time and money.
Symbiotic Group is committed to workplace diversity and is able to provide resources to assist firms to meet their Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal resource requirements.
We would like to thank you for your interest. Please note that all submissions will be assessed. However, only suitable candidates will be contacted further.
Please submit your most recent resume to: agnes.maison@symbioticgroup.com
post.title: Application Consultant - DT - Permanent Position
